1372: Kybben was born in St. Ians straet in 1372.
1392: Kybben moved to De Vyver.B.4 after marriage.
Got married to Atghardis at age 21 in 1392.
1386: Lost mother at the age of 14.
1387: Lost sibling Kolekinus in 1387 when Kolekinus was 5.
1397: Lost sibling Volcwiif in 1397 when Volcwiif was 22.
Lost son Suam when Suam was 0 years old.
Atghardis gave birth to their stillborn son Suam in 1397.
1393: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Liudburgis, at age 21.
1396: Had a daughter with Atghardis, Emgelberna, at age 24.
1398: Had a son with Atghardis, Jiusippus, at age 26.
Lost son Jiusippus when Jiusippus was 1 years old.
